thread.title: Welcome to the Saudi Royal Court. Please Enjoy a Pumpernickel Bagel.

author: Margherita Stancati
title: Welcome to the Saudi Royal Court. Please Enjoy a Pumpernickel Bagel.
text:
In Saudi Arabia, subjects wishing to make requests of the Saudi royal family come to a palace court, where they are traditionally hosted in richly carpeted reception halls decked with glittering chandeliers and brocade sofas.
Last week, they came to a basement hallway of a Midtown Manhattan Hilton, where they were offered pumpernickel bagels.
...
